solution_line_template: So the total number of streetlights that will be used is {num_squares} squares * {streetlights_per_square} streetlights/square = <<{num_squares}*{streetlights_per_square}={total_used_streetlights}>>{total_used_streetlights} streetlights

There will be {total_bought_streetlights} streetlights - {total_used_streetlights} streetlights = <<{total_bought_streetlights}-{total_used_streetlights}={unused_streetlights}>>{unused_streetlights} streetlights unused.
